Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Luke the Evangelist:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/: n~te pimay/tyc n~te pi<rictoc: Loukac pieuaggelict/c: P~[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers, of the disciple of Christ, Luke the evangelist, O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
بصلوات تلميذ المسيح، لوقا الإنجيلي، يا رب انعم علينا بمغفرة خطايانا.
